DOC.brief_title: Decrease Opioid Consumption With Intra-Venous ( IV ) Acetaminophen After Colorectal Surgery ( DOCIVA )
DOC.detailed_description: All patient undergo laparoscopic open colorectal surgery randomize receive either IV acetaminophen placebo . All patient receive opioid patient control anesthesia ( PCA ) . IV acetaminophen ( 1 gram ) placebo give 30 minute prior operation every 6 hour thereafter 5 day post-operatively discharge . The investigator primary endpoint evaluate opioid consumption patient 's hospital stay . The investigator secondary endpoint evaluate return gastrointestinal function ( ROGIF ) , time diet order ( TTDO ) , length hospital stay ( LOHS ) occurrence ileus . Pain measured pain visual analog scale score ( PVASS ) 3 , 8 , 24 48 hour .
